import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Contact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', email: '', message: '' }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Handle form submission here console.log('Form submitted:', formData); }; return (
{/* Main Contact Section */}
{/* Left Column - Contact Information */}

CONTACT US.

Email: INFO@RIYADHFASHIONWEEK.COM
Address: RIYADH, SAUDI ARABIA
{/* Social Media Icons */}
{/* Right Column - Contact Form */}
); }; export default Contact;
